#MOV R0 0xAA (10101010)
#0x01 100 3AA
011003aa

#MOV R1 0x55 (01010101)
#0x01 101 355
01101355

#MOV R2 0xAA (10101010)
#0x01 102 3AA
011023aa

#MOV R3 0x55 (01010101)
#0x01 103 355
01103355

#XOR R0 R1 (Output should be 0xff)
#0x0E 100 101
0x0e100101

#NOT R2 (0xAA -> 0x55)
#0x0F 102 000
0x0f102000

#XOR R3 R2 (Output should be 0x00)
#0x0E 103 102
0x0e103102
